text: The 2014 The National in November was held from November 19 to 23 at the Essar Centre in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario as part of the 2014–15 World Curling Tour. The National was the second men's Grand Slam event of the season. ==Teams== The teams are listed as follows: {| class=wikitable |- ! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
